pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-5067: Revert all changes to entity types
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: Could you add this test in front of one of the current tests? For e2e testing, I think it's better to have longer tests that simulate real user interactions.
These actions can be in front of the save all entity test.
